title: CDC Director On Release Of American Ebola Patients
teaser: Tom Frieden, director of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, discusses recovery and release of the American patients.
contentencoded:
As both American Ebola patients who were brought from Liberia to Atlanta for treatment are released, Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson speaks to Tom Frieden, director of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC).

  • Related: American Ebola Patients Released From Hospital

Guest

  • Tom Frieden, director of the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention. He tweets

    @DrFriedenCDC.
